showerReviews.reviewText: I had my bridal shower here recently and it was the perfect spot. A large room with chairs/tables you can set up how you would like, a kitchen for all prepping needs & you have access to the community center all day. Located right off 376 …

We had our baby shower here recently, and the area is so quaint and peaceful. Our shower was amazing because of how great this space is. It had everything that we needed to make this event run smoothly. 10/10 would recommend.

My bridal shower was hosted here a few weeks ago. The space is great, the kitchen is super helpful. Great to DYI and save some money, and it was awesome to have the space for the whole day. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because …
Very nice place for a shower or private party. It has a full kitchen. It's the old Rosslyn Farms school. Right off of 376 and very easy to get to.

showerReviews.reviewText: I love visiting the Doormont pool. It's so clean, family friendly and really affordable. It's only $8 for adults to get in. …

We arrived around 1:15 and was down at the end, it was a pretty good hill to set your chairs on. It was worth it though. A great day at the pool.

locations.title: Westwood Swimming Pool
locations.content: Westwood Swimming Pool may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a great neighborhood pool for local kids and families.  No slides or diving boards.  I live close by.  Took my daughter there and now retired, take my grandchildren 2-4x a week.  Rarely crowded except on July's hottest days.  Clean. …

They have a decent size pool and a kids pool. There are also lifeguards on duty. But that's pretty much it. There are no outdoor lounging chairs, but rather only grass seating. Facilities are minimal at best. It'll do if you live close by but don't make the drive to go there.

Obviously it is closed during this time of year. However, it looks like it's very well kept. The surrounding grounds are clean & not littered with trash. NEVER was in it, but from what I just seen it looks like it would be a good place for young kids to go in the summer.
The pool is the cleanest. We love swimming in their and it’s a great place to have friends and family fun.

showerReviews.reviewText: … The pool ,grounds  bathrooms and changing / shower area immaculate ...hope she's there next year..
Family pool. concession stand, shower, a slide, toddler area with fountains to play under. Located in a clean, non smoking community park.
